Class DeadSimpleSoloController

java.lang.Object
it.unisa.diem.ai.torcs.agent.Controller
it.unisa.diem.ai.torcs.agent.DeadSimpleSoloController
public class DeadSimpleSoloController extends Controller
A very basic implementation of the Controller class. This controller drives the car with a constant acceleration and very simple steering logic.

Designed mainly for demonstration or testing purposes.

Author:
Created by IntelliJ IDEA. Date: Mar 4, 2008 Time: 4:59:21 PM

  • Method Details

    • control

      public Action control(SensorModel sensorModel)
      Main control method which defines the driving behavior based on sensor input.
      • Accelerates if current speed is below the target speed
      • Steers slightly based on the angle to the track axis
      • Sets gear to 1
      Specified by:
      control in class Controller
      Parameters:
      sensorModel - the current sensor data from the car
      Returns:
      an Action representing the control commands

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the internal state before a new trial starts. Simply prints a message to the console.
      Specified by:
      reset in class Controller

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Called when the controller is shutting down. Simply prints a message to the console.
      Specified by:
      shutdown in class Controller
